attributes.review: I was excited to download the Trump app cause who doesn’t love to support the president?!?! But then, I was met by a CRUSTY CHEETO IN A SUIT!!!!! It was honestly disgusting. I cant believe that THIS is our president.  Anyways, ACAB, BLM, LGBTQ+ rights, Anyone other than Trump 2020.
